snippet.title: Metro 2033 - Launch Trailer (Official) HD
snippet.description:
Metro 2033 is a survival horror first-person shooter video game, based on the novel Metro 2033 by Russian author Dmitry Glukhovsky.

ORDER NOW! at Amazon: http://www.amazon.de/gp/product/B002WRY4BU?ie=UTF8&tag=xboxviewtv-21&linkCode=as2&camp=1638&creative=6742&creativeASIN=B002WRY4BU

Metro 2033
Developer: 4A Games
Release Date: Mar 16, 2010
Genre: Action, Shooter
Platform: PC, Xbox 360
Publisher: THQ
Website: http://www.metro2033game.com/

FOLLOW XboxViewTV on Twitter
http://www.Twitter.com/XboxViewTV
